data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 2, Marco Serra signals a free kick to Crotone.
Junior Messias of Crotone gets in a strike, but is off target.
Bologna have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Crotone to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Riccardo Orsolini for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 4, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 7, Marco Serra signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Riccardo Orsolini for Bologna drives towards goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
In the minute 10, Marco Serra awards Crotone a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Bologna.
Marco Serra awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Marco Serra signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
Jacopo Petriccione (Crotone) has received a yellow card from Marco Serra.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Marco Serra signals a Crotone throw-in in Bologna's half.
In the minute 17, Attention is being given to Bolognaâ€™s Riccardo Orsolini and play has been suspended briefly.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Sinisa Mihajlovic (Bologna) has taken off Riccardo Orsolini who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Nicola Sansone is the replacement.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Bologna in the half of Crotone.
At Renato Dall'Ara, Luca Marrone has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Bologna.
Bologna's Danilo goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 27, Milos Vulic for Crotone gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
Milos Vulic (Crotone) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 29, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Aaron Hickey (Bologna) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
In the minute 34, Crotone drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Bologna's Rodrigo Palacio breaks free at Renato Dall'Ara. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Bologna's Rodrigo Palacio is whistled for offside at Renato Dall'Ara.
Simeon Nwankwo (Crotone) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Bologna defenders.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Crotone.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Marco Serra signals a throw-in for Crotone, close to Bologna's area.
In the minute 42, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Throw-in Bologna.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Marco Serra will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Bologna.
Bologna's Nicola Sansone goes close with a header against the bar.
In the minute 45, Marco Serra signals a free kick to Crotone.
The first half has been concluded at Renato Dall'Ara.
Goal! A Roberto Soriano header gives Bologna a 1-0 lead in Bologna.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 46, Giovanni Stroppa (Crotone) is making a first substitution, with Giuseppe Cuomo replacing Luca Marrone.
In the minute 47, Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In Bologna, Musa Barrow (Bologna) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 48, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
In Bologna Bologna attack through Nicola Sansone. The finish is off target, however.
Marco Serra awards Crotone a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Crotone push forward at Renato Dall'Ara and Milos Vulic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bologna defence.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?

In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lisandro Magallan for Crotone has been booked by Marco Serra and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 59, Crotone make their second substitution with Denis Dragus replacing Milos Vulic.
The away team replace Lisandro Magallan with Vladimir Golemic.
In the minute 60, Crotone needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
Bologna are in shooting range from this free kick.
Lorenzo De Silvestri gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bologna.

Musa Barrow of Bologna is pulled up for offside.

Simeon Nwankwo for Crotone is whistled offside.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.

Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.

Can Crotone capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?

Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 75, Nicolas Dominguez is replacing Mattias Svanberg for the home team.
Marco Serra awards the away team a throw-in.

Giovanni Crociata is on a sub for Arkadiusz Reca for Crotone.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Throw-in for Bologna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Bologna's Nicolas Dominguez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.

Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in Crotone.
In the minute 84, Marco Serra awards Bologna a goal kick.
Marco Serra signals a throw-in for Bologna, close to Crotone's area.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Bologna just outside Crotone's area.
Bologna push forward at Renato Dall'Ara and Rodrigo Palacio gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Crotone defence.
In the minute 87, Emanuel Vignato is replacing Musa Barrow for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Bologna, Emanuel Vignato of Bologna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Nicolas Dominguez (Bologna) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.

At Renato Dall'Ara the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Crotone needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.

Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
Crotone needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
The match has come to a close in Bologna. The final score is 1-0.
